text.div:
UnitsOfTime

A unit of time (units from UCUM).

Copyright Statement: These codes are excerpted from UCUM (THE UNIFIED CODE FOR UNITS OF MEASURE). UCUM is Copyright © 1989-2013 Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and The UCUM Organization, Indianapolis, IN. All rights reserved. See http://unitsofmeasure.org/trac//wiki/TermsOfUse for details.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    sssecond
    minminminute
    hhhour
    ddday
    wkwkweek
    momomonth
    aayear
